tool_description: No. 1 rated Indian listed stock and options data provider with Indian Stocks with respective to price, performance, technical and fundamental options. The cloud based API has a simple interface and return easy to consume data in JSON format for options prices.
name: India-Trending-Stock-API
title: India-Trending-Stock-API

api_list.name: Top Trending India Companies Stocks by Fundamental
api_list.description: Get TopTrending Indian companies stock live data with respective to Fundamental
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-trending-stock-api.p.rapidapi.com/india_trending_stocks_by_fundamental"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-trending-stock-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
